home desc.one:
You are at home. It‚Äôs safe here. No monsters. Warm blankets.
There are other places if you want to do something more exciting.
Ruin something‚Äôs day by going to the forest to hunt it - press F
Go to the shop to buy, sell or upgrade items - press S

home desc without pylon.one:
Hmm, you are fresh out of Pylons.
No Pylons, no LOUD. It's a sad reality.
You can either buy some Pylons or sell some stuff on the market.

home desc without character.one:
Welcome to Legend of the Undead Dragon! üêâ 
 
To play LOUD, you need at least one character.
You can manifest a fresh soul at Pylons Central
or you can head to the market where other players may have one on offer.

forest desc.one:
Oh! Here are the dark and spooky woods.
Somehow everything lives here at the same time. Don‚Äôt think about it. Just choose something to pick a fight with.

shop desc.one:
It‚Äôs a blacksmith‚Äôs store.
The blacksmith sells things, buys things, and mends things.
Sometimes he regrets his choices in life.

pylons central desc.one: Turn Pylons into useful things. Like pretend gold. Yes! This is a good use of your valuable Pylons.

develop desc.one: You are testing things for development. Please enter commands you want to try

help desc.one: This is the help page for LOUD. Look around the 1-9 sub pages for an overview.

select buy character desc.one: Summon a hero. We got a whole lot of chosen ones back here.

select buy item desc.one: Swords are big and clever. Big. And. Clever.

select sell item desc.one: Sell some stuff. Make money, get britches. We‚Äôre pretty sure that‚Äôs how it works.

rabbits outcome.one:
üêá
Not known for putting up much of a fight.
Also typically not very rich. Fuzziness factor, off the charts!
Some rabbits are really super-mean though so be careful!.

Reward üí∞ 1 - 2
1% chance of character dying

goblin outcome.one:
üë∫
Sneaky but weak. You can take him.
Goblins don't have much money but they have a high chance to drop their ear.

Reward üí∞ 50
Enemy info (HP: 10, Attack: 1)
2% chance of character dying
3% chance of sword lose
20% chance of getting "Goblin ear"
20% chance of "Goblin boots"

wolf outcome.one:
üê∫
Aroooo! Not as fuzzy as the rabbit, better at biting things too.
Wolves don't have any money so they don't have gold.
But they do have wolf tails. Those might be useful, even if you aren't a wolf

Reward üí∞ 1
Enemy info (HP: 15, Attack: 3)
3% chance of character dying
3% chance of sword lose
40% chance of getting "Wolf tail"
30% chance of "Wolf fur"

troll outcome.one:
üëª
Big, smelly, and fond of ‚Äòyo mama‚Äô jokes. Don‚Äôt say we didn‚Äôt warn you.
Trolls don't really drop their toes but they might have a lot of gold because they eat unlucky travellers

Reward üí∞ 300
Enemy info (HP: 20, Attack: 5)
4% chance of character dying
3% chance of sword lose
10% chance of getting "Troll toes"
30% chance of "Troll smelly bones"

giant outcome.one:
üóø
Bigger than the troll, smellier than the troll. Less of a sense of humour than the troll.

Reward üí∞ 3000
Enemy info (HP: 100, Attack: 10)
5% chance of character dying
3% chance of sword lose
10% chance of bonus skill
Hmm.. 4%, 3%, 3% for fire, ice, acid
üóø (GiantKiller) badge on character

fire dragon outcome.one:
ü¶ê
The classic fire-breathing dragon. You know the drill. Get at it!

Reward üí∞ 10000
Enemy info (HP: 300, Attack: 30)
4% chance for character dying
3% chance of sword lose
10% chance of getting "Fire scale"
FireDragonKiller badge on character

ice dragon outcome.one:
ü¶à
It‚Äôs blue, it‚Äôs cold, and it‚Äôs not your friend.

Reward üí∞ 10000
Enemy info (HP: 300, Attack: 30)
4% chance for character dying
3% chance of sword lose
10% chance of getting "Icy shards"
IceDragonKiller badge on character

acid dragon outcome.one:
üêä
Lost its way at a music festival. Colours confuse it. Will melt you and everything you hold dear in a heartbeat.

Reward üí∞ 10000

help about.one:
Legend of Undead Dragon v0.1.0
This is an old-school prototype game built to run on the pylons ecosystem.

help what you can do.one:
The purpose of this game is to defeat the Undead Dragon.
As you progress, you will fight enemies, buy swords from the blacksmith, and trade swords that you found in your adventures.
You need to have at least one character to play the game and you will also need gold to buy swords. Swords are good. You need swords to fight most monsters. You can get better swords too. Those are pretty awesome. Sometimes you will taste the bitter ashes of defeat, other times you will feel the euphoria of victory. This game is a real emotional rollercoaster.
You need swords to fight some monsters, during the game you will experience chilly dying and hot winner emotion.

help navigation.one:
There are 8 menus that you will use to navigate around the game.
You can go to Home, Forest, Shop, Pylons Central, Friends, Settings, Help page or Escape from the game using the navigation menu.

help page layout.one:
Each page has 5 sections.
- Navigation menu at the top
- Inventory on right
- Commands you can run under menu on left side.
- Situation box at the center left side.
- Input box at the bottom left of the page
- You can see all of your options for any menu at the top of the page.
- It provides an action list showing you what choices are available and what the hotkeys to select them are.

help game rules.one:
Don't use offensive or sexually explicit nicknames.
Don't automate trading orders with a bot.

help how it works.one:
This game works on a blockchain statemachine.
The game state changes when the transaction that contains your command, is confirmed and that command is run on all nodes that are running all over the world.
This game engine is a white box and you can experience a real blockchain game world while playing LOUD.

help pylons central.one: You can do all the operations that spend pylons here. You can buy gold from pylons, do trading and send items/characters to friends.

help upcoming releases.one:
We are excited to hear your feedback on the v0.1.0 release and we will use your suggestions to make decisions on how to go forward.
We already have tons of features implemented in the core daemon, so if you ask for something, we can make changes according to that.
You will be able to build your own game by forking our project, as this is a prototype game.

help Support.one: Contact loud@pylons.tech for anything about LOUD game.
